name: Pink Platforms
description:
Do your best to get to the red platform! Made this game for the 7 Minute Game Jam. Focused on basic stuff (making a basic material, quitting game,etc.). Big file size since I used the default UE4 ThirdPerson Starter file, sorry!

Controls: 

WASD --> move around

Space Bar --> Jump

R --> Close game to restart

I was an idiot so thanks to this guy for this video (forgot what Parameter makes colours in UE4 lol):
